title: Complex Multi-Milestone Project
description: Advanced multi-phase project with varying milestone values and detailed requirements

milestones.description: Initial Discovery and Requirements Gathering - Comprehensive analysis of project scope
System Architecture Design - Technical specifications and system blueprints
Core Development Phase 1 - Backend infrastructure and database design
Core Development Phase 2 - Frontend implementation and API integration
Quality Assurance and Testing - Comprehensive testing and bug fixes
Documentation and Knowledge Transfer - Complete documentation and training
Production Deployment and Support - Go-live support and monitoring
